N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 507.3 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) These
regulations apply to a local governmental unit which elects to participate in
the community based service system for children with serious emotional
disturbance. (b) These regulations
apply to a provider of services which has contracted with a local governmental
unit to provide community based services to children with serious emotional
disturbance. (c) These regulations
apply to the establishment and operation of a local interagency group. Such
interagency group is to be responsible for monitoring the community based
system of services, identifying gaps in the service system, recommending the
development of services where appropriate and providing technical assistance to
the member agencies. An existing interagency group which is able to perform
these functions may be appropriate. This group shall be advisory to the local
governmental unit with responsibility for the provision of mental health
services. Notes
